page.title: 11Houses & Housing in Clun
page.content: We carried out a house to house survey to find out what we could about dwellings in Clun. The survey covered almost all the houses in the township of Clun, but not the surrounding area in our block. 65 % of the houses in Clun are made of stone, 31% are made of brick and 4% of other materials. Approximately 56% of houses are owner occupied, 21% are council tenants, 9% are private tenants, 5% are holiday homes and the rest are occupied under other arrangements. 35% were built before 1800, 18% between 1800 and 1900, 15% between 1900 and 1930, 16% between 1930 and 1970 and 16% since 1970. 43% are semi detached houses, 37% are detached, 15% are terraced and there are a small number of flats which have been converted from bigger houses.
